main event: On 24 July 1952, a member of the Air Force Band based at Moody AFB, Georgia, reported seeing three unidentified flying objects that exhibited unusual flying characteristics.
interesting points: The objects changed colors from white to red to blue-white and back to white at approximately one-second intervals,The first object was observed for about seven minutes performing various maneuvers, including hovering and darting in circles,Two dimmer lights appeared later, performing gyrations without changing color,The sighting occurred under clear weather conditions with no other aircraft reported in the area,The observer, a high school graduate with extensive military flying experience, noted that the objects did not resemble any known aircraft.
sighted object: three brilliant lights in the sky
witness description: A member of the Air Force Band with extensive military flying experience
